column3: Description
Instead of using steering wheel , user will use screen to control car

column2: Mobile phone application for self driving
column3: Control you car on a mobile phone app
Control your car with a voice interface like siri
Advanced GPS navigation system
Car navigate itself to charging station( assume it is a electric car)
Detect and connect nearby car
User can sleep inside a moving car
Sensors can be used in any weather condition
Applied machine learning algorithm to train the navigation system of car
self-parking
Inputs can be done through hand writing with a stylus, can be used to draw the preferred path
Mouse/Keyboard like control system for easy uses input and possible system development usage
Wireless signal can piggyback off of other autonomous vehicles in areas where data connectivity is limited, like in tunnels or underground car parks
Program that can display on the UI which vehicles near you are autonomously or manually operated, provide information on which vehicles are connected to the car you are riding in
Vehicle uses active suspension and doors to allow for ease of entry and exit, such as lowering the car for entry and exit, deploying a ramp or seats that swivel out
System that can automatically pick up luggage and place it into the trunk
Lights outside the vehicle that show its status (i.e. occupied, connected, available, manually controlled, etc.)
Seats that recline paired with a roof mounted display that can display entertainment or system information
Include entrances and exits to buildings in the system's path-finding so it can pick people up at the door
Large panoramic display that runs along the interior, they can used to show instructions and warnings
When emergencies occur, people can use extra control system to control the car and protect themselves from bad accident. People will feel safe if they can control cars.
WIFI system provide people with chance to surf the Internet more flexible and they can use this system to communicate with other cars.
Through this system, vehicles are able to collect road information like traffic accident, parking space and etc., and sync information to computer and cloud to help to optimize route.
Sofa chair is able to become a bed when people want to sleep in the car and the angle of seats can be controlled well
People can chat with their family members while they are on the road via the vehicle's communication system. And thus they will feel safe and relaxed.
Allow people to kill their time in the car like play games, watching videos and etc. while people needn't pay all  of their attention to driving
Be able to help people sleep better in the car
Seats of our autonomous vehicles are able to rotate any angle and people can chat or even play cards with their friends in the car face to face.
Windows of autonomous vehicles are able to become display screen when people need and they can use their fingers to control the "windows screens".

Considering our potential customers may include disabled people, so our autonomous vehicles will not only be controlled by inputing words through dashboard, but also by voice or some other kinds of information. And it can chat with you like Siri.
Allow user to inform the vehicle to make a right or left turn by waiving his/her hand to that direction within certain space in the vehicle.
User can assign someone to control the vehicle remotely on a laptop or smartphone.
User can apply brake on the vehicle to slow it down when from the user’s perspective there is a danger. The vehicle would optimize the best riding quality when slowing down.
When user is getting off the vehicle, he/she is able to press a single button to inform the vehicle to park itself.
When user gets off the vehicle and there is no one on the vehicle for 15 seconds, the vehicle would park itself without any further instruction from the user.
User can “speak” to the vehicle to inform the destination of change of route.

column2: Video Call Projection for Visualizing Communication
column3: Allow use to make a video call in car and project the video call image on the windshield so that user can see his/her family.
Use 3D projection technique to project such user’s calling person under the windshield when such user is on a phone call.
When user is about to get on the car, he/she can simply click on a smartphone app to notify the vehicle to come over.
When user is about to get on the car, he/she can simply click on a wearable device to notify the vehicle to come over.
Price the services at a higher price to increase users’ sense of safety toward the product.
Put only one person in each car to reduct the fear of co-riding with strangers

column2: Slow down the vehicle with one button
column3: One single button to slow down the vehicle while still in autonomous driving mode
Allow people in different cars to communicate with each other
User comfortable light color in car (soft)
Share the ride with someone who can drive to take over the control of the vehicle when necessary
Have someone sit in the autonomous driving vehicle with them in the first couple times
One single button to take a photo in car and outside the car
Have autonomous driving vehicles deliver products first
Have a real-time camera around the vehicle all the time
Attach a drone to the vehicle to capture more on-road situation
Equip the vehicle with tables for working or eating
Users can control the car from any distance by phone. Such as "call" the car to pick them up at their location
measure distance between own car and other cars_traffic lights or other obstacle
Autonomous driving data can be uploaded into the cloud, so company can detect the safety of autonomous car from these data
The form of chair can be changed from normal back-rest to deck chair and bed
There are two pedals under the steering wheel. Drivers can use these to exercise and the energy can be converted into electrical power
The color and transparency of windows can be changed and the image of computer screen can be displayed on windows
Show driving routine and real building feature around path. Highlight different function in different color
The screen of computer is installed at the steering wheel. Car driver can either use it by voice command or finger
Users can control the car with their voice
If there is some problem with the car, there will be an alert and the car cannot be started
The robotic embedded in the vehicle system can help driver execute related actions
The car will contact police department and other related department when the passenger has  any emergency
When the driver lay on the seat, he or she can still see the screen
The floor of interior is embedded with chairs
Can help disables get on the car easily
The car can self park

column2: Touch screen with personal laptop connection
column3: The screen on the car can connect into personal laptop
The screen on the car can change the angle
The signal on the dashboard can identify whether the care sensed the traffic light
This warning signal can tell the driver the traffic situation ahead
The vehicle can connect to user's phone, laptop and other electronics device
The car will warn the user for the unavoidable obstacles
The car will warn the user to be prepared for the unavoidable accident
The car will warn the user for the low battery
The car will warn the user for the malfunction of the sensors
The car will warn the user for the necessary maintenance
The seats of the car can change the shape to better fit the users
The car can project the laptop screen at certain area
The car will turn on or off the HVAC before the user step into the car
The car will save all the enviornment data into centern computer
